      • registerUser

        public int registerUser(java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String password)
        Registers the supplied customer
        Parameters:
        username - - Username of the customer
        password - - Password set by the customer
        Returns:
        0 = If username already exists -1 otherwise

      • checkUser

        public int checkUser(java.lang.String username,
                     java.lang.String password,
                     boolean isLogin)
        Evaluates if the credentials supplied by the customer is valid
        Parameters:
        username - - Username of the customer
        password - - Password set by the customer
        isLogin - - true if it is to check the credentials during login process false if it is to check the username is available during registration/sign up
        Returns:
        0 = Successful Login/Username is already in use 1 = No such user exists/Username is available 2 = Password mismatch 3 = Customer is banned by the Administrator
